sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.TimeSheetPolicyFactory</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>TimeSheetPolicyFactory</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var TimeSheetPolicyFactory = Class.create();
TimeSheetPolicyFactory.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	createDefaultFromProperties: function() {
		var gr = new GlideRecord('time_sheet_policy');
		gr.initialize();
		gr.is_default = true;
		gr.name = "Default time sheet policy";
		gr.week_starts_on = GlidePropertiesDB.get('com.snc.time_card.start_day', '7');
		gr.auto_fill_from_time_worked = GlidePropertiesDB.get('com.snc.time_card.time_worked', '0');
		gr.auto_create_on_task_update = GlidePropertiesDB.get('com.snc.time_card.autocreate', '0');
		gr.update_resource_plan = true;
		gr.max_hours_per_day = GlidePropertiesDB.get('com.snc.time_sheet.max_hours_per_day', '-1');
		gr.max_hours_per_week = GlidePropertiesDB.get('com.snc.time_sheet.max_hours_per_week', '-1');
		var sysId = gr.insert();
		return sysId;
	},

    type: 'TimeSheetPolicyFactory'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2016-10-12 09:52:29</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>2c3b19e793d6220064f572edb67ffbaa</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>TimeSheetPolicyFactory</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Time Card Management" source="com.snc.time_card">3bef86e747e64210cd4e1ce4316d4343</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2c3b19e793d6220064f572edb67ffbaa</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2017-08-11 06:23:46</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
